body.name: A&J Koti Table Crumb Sweeper - Small Mini Metal Dustpan and Hand Brush Combo Set - Wood Crumber for Servers, Restaurants, Home and Kitchen - Crumb Cleaning Set
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 13 hrs 45 mins
features: 【Efficient Crumb Sweeper】: This mini dustpan and brush set effortlessly sweeps away crumbs and debris from dining room tables, kitchen countertops, desks, and other surfaces. Its soft bristles prevent scratches on furniture and ensure thorough cleaning.

【Compact & Stylish Design】: Measuring 6.1 x 3.9 x 1.6 inches (15.5 x 10 x 4 cm), this small dustpan and brush set is easy to store and fits seamlessly with your kitchen accessories. Its built-in magnets on the handle and pan ensure you never lose a piece of the set.

【Lightweight & Easy-to-use】: Weighting only 0.5 lbs (235 g), this crumb cleaning set is convenient to use at home or in restaurants. Its wooden handle features a groove for a steady grip, while the metal pan collects all debris without spillage.
【Sustainable & Cruelty-free】: This table crumb sweeper is made of beech, a sustainable wood while the dustpan is made of metal, and its bristles are cruelty-free.

【Versatile Use】: Ideal for use as a mini broom and dustpan set, small crumber for servers, or wood crumber for your dining table, this crumb sweeper is a must-have kitchen accessory that's both practical and stylish.
body.description: Introducing the A&J Koti Table Crumb Sweeper - the perfect solution to keeping your kitchen and dining area clean and tidy. With the constant mess that occurs during meal preparation and consumption, cleaning can feel like an endless task. However, with the A&J Koti Crumb Sweeper, you can effortlessly sweep away crumbs and debris from any surface with ease. Sustainably keep things clean and tidy Crafted with sustainability in mind, the crumb sweeper is made of beech wood, a sustainable material, and its bristles are cruelty-free. The soft bristles effectively remove all crumbs and debris from your furniture, leaving nothing behind. The metal dustpan has been designed to collect all debris with no spillage on the floor, saving you time and headache when it comes to keeping your interior clean and tidy. Easy to use/Easy to store Measuring only 6.1 x 3.9 x 1.6 inches (15.5 x 10 x 4 cm) and weighing just 0.5 lbs (235 g), this crumb cleaning set is compact, easy to use and easy to store. Additionally, the built-in magnets keep the pan and handle together, ensuring that no part of the set goes missing. Versatile - a multi-usage product for everyone This versatile cleaning tool is not only perfect for sweeping away crumbs but can also be used as a mini broom and dustpan set or a table crumber for servers. The ergonomic design features a groove for a steady hand grip, making it easy to use for everyone in your household. Say goodbye to messy tables and countertops and hello to a cleaner, more organized space with the A&J Koti Table Crumb Sweeper. What’s included 1 x brush, 1 x Dustpan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Where has this little thing been al my life? I use this in my kitchen to sweep crumbs up from the island or counter. It is cute as can be, so I leave it out on the counter and it gets used every single day. This is one of those things you don't know you need until you have it, then you can't live without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little purchase!!
reviews.reviewText: Seems like I was always wiping up crumbs and other messes on my counters! No more. This little wonder does a thorough job and is so easy to use. I really questioned whether or not I needed it. Yes!! It really is the best little gadget I didn't know I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Little Sweeper
reviews.reviewText: Where has this little sweeper been all my life? I never realized I needed it until after I bought it. I'm using it all the time. I recently spilled dried oregano all over my counter - what a mess! This little sweeper made swift work of cleaning it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy little tool
reviews.reviewText: This small dustpan and brush is ideal for picking up crumbs from the floor, or clearing the dining room table of messes made by kids eating cereal. Very handy. The combination stays together thanks to magnets on the back of the dustpan and the brush handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It does exactly what it says it does, but its also one of those things you don't actually use as much as you expect too and it's mainly just taking up space in my already overcrowded kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the size!
reviews.reviewText: Great little dustpan and brush ( uses a magnet in the brush handle to attach to pan).I like it for clearing crumbs off the counter, not on the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this little thing. Of you have a patterned counter surface, it can be hard to be sure you've gotten all the crumbs. This solves the problem! It lives in my stove - I use it nearly every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft enough for fine tablecloth - strong enough for counters! And it is cute!
